statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({7.91}+{7.57}\right)}={30.96}\approx{30.96}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{7.57}\cdot{7.33}={55.4881}\approx{55.5}.
